comment: Professor Hardy is an exceptionally professional, who genuinely cares about your success. I highly recommend her for Statistics. During my Maymester, we had the opportunity to learn the entire course in just two weeks, and it was an incredible journey.  If you prefer a more relaxed pace, you can opt for her during the regular semester.

She makes Stats easy. Definitely buy her notes or print them out. It's all you need the entire class, and it's only like $18. Tests and homework is on ALEKS. If you do your homework and the practice, you will ace the exams. She gave us an extra credit opportunity for 10 points at the end of the semester too. I would take her again if I could.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework

comment: she is very nice and takes late work but with penalty, all your work is on ALEKS with many parts to it, a lot of work but very easy just time consuming. exams are also on ALEKS so no lockdown. attendance is not mandatory. overall she is very great just a lot of work.

I have her 8am rn and I don't regret it one bit. She is an amazing teacher. Her tests are online and at home. Just do the homework and get 100 on them, just put effort. Do the study guides and write down how to do it and you'll be okay. She also has a student tutor available, she is amazing. Helping me get 3 A's and one B on my tests. Use resources

She is such a good teacher when it comes to Math. She explains everything clearly and goes step by step. She is also so caring and wants the best for her students. There are so many resources available for help. I went to SI with Aiyana, and she cleared up any questions that I had. Overall, I would recommend her for Stat.

She uses Aleks for all homework and test. You can take homework as many times as you need to get an A, and they are the same questions as the tests. Attendance is extra credit. If you get all A's on homework tests are super easy. Practice your calculation programs and you will do great. She is very open to any questions and has lots of patience.
A fair but honest teacher. Except a ton of weekly assignments that she grades under a microscope.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Lots of homework--So many papers

comment: LOVE Prof. Hardy. personally have never been a math person and I'm not strong with it, but she has a great way of explaining things and is always available to help and always takes questions. the class can be tough if you fall behind bc a lot of the material builds on what you've previously learned, but she keeps D2L updated really well.

Professor Hardy's STAT1401 class is a gem! She has a unique teaching style that makes the subject engaging. Minimal homework, home-based tests, and great study resources like the inexpensive booklet make this class very manageable. Using tools like unstuck study alongside the class materials can really help with preparation.
She cares a lot about her students. She makes you buy this booklet of her teachings in class and Its kind of pointless because you learn everything on ALEKS.

Hardy is the best professor you will ever have for a math course. She's understanding, caring, and walks through the WHY of math, not just the how.

Has a textbook available, but you won't need it so long as you buy her required notes from the bookstore. Worth every penny. Love her.

Susan Hardy Is AMAZING. I'm in her online May semester class and highly recommend Her. Keep in mind if you take her for May semester The lectures will be long since it's a two-week course but it's engaging, and she ensures you understand the material. Minimal homework, tests are based on study guides, plus bonus and participation points.

Professor Hardy is a wonderful professor. If you are going to take STAT take it with Hardy. She is very caring and gives a review before each test that will be VERY helpful for the test. All tests taken at home, no lockdown or webcam. She explains everything very well and she likes when the class participates. Overall, a great professor.

Hardy has an odd way of teaching with a ton of participation. All tests were on Aleks and homework was due on Sundays or Tuesdays. Stopped going to class 1/4 through and made a high A in the class. If you are good at math it is okay if you miss lectures, if you are bad at math? DON'T miss a lecture because you will struggle!

Professor Hardy is AMAZING! Her teaching style is immaculate. I am not a good math person and she explains things so well. If you aren't good at math TAKE HER! Not tons of homework, no lockdown browsers.
tbh i never went to this class, if your already ok at math you can just do the homework and projects and be fine without going to the lectures.

Professor Hardy is AMAZING! Taker her for stat. All of her tests are on ALEKS and you take them at home. This class is very doable and she does a great job at teaching the content in an easy to understand way. Highly HIGHLY recommend.

Statistics do not sound fun but Hardy makes it fun. You should buy the $20 booklet from the school library for her class because she goes over the entire class within that booklet, it is very helpful for when you're studying. She does ALEKS for homework and test grades and she's really funny, she gives me Ms. Lawton vibes.

Absolutely take her! Love her so much, easy grader. Wants you to understand stats and is available outside of class if needed. Can also get extra credit. There is homework but you can turn it in late if needed. Very understanding and applies stats to every day life
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: Dr. Hardy was a great professor, as long as you tried on the homework, you would do great on tests! tests are also taken online which was beneficial but if there were ever something to come up, Dr. Hardy stuck to her rules. She is a very caring person though and would offer help outside the class towards the end of the semester.
such an amazing and understanding professor. truly cares about her students and their success. great person and great at teaching. i would definitely take one of her classes again. very sweet lady.

Professor Hardy is GREAT. Amazing lecturer, I highly recommend ALWAYS showing up to her classes. She makes everything so clear and really cares about her students grades. There was weekly homework but if you stay on top of everything, they are really easy. I'm really thankful for my experience with her.

Professor Hardy is an amazing math teacher. I took her specifically for stat because I was afraid of math and she made it soooo easy. The test questions come directly from Aleks and she explains everything super well. If you don't understand something she actually cares about helping you fix whatever you're doing wrong. 10/10 would take again

If you are bad at math or statistics, PLEASE take Professor Hardy! She made everything easy, and her lectures can be entertaining. I would take this class twice because I enjoyed it so much. Tests are just like the homework, just changed the numbers. The only downside is that the notes are $15 and it's not smart to skip a lecture.

Just as others have mentioned, Professor Hardy is fantastic. Your grade consists of four exams, homework, participation, a department assessment, and a final. She is excellent at teaching and very patient. The exams are precisely like the homework, and she offers help sessions every day. Do your homework daily, practice and you will make an A.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things

comment: Professor Hardy makes statistics easy to understand as she explains the reasoning behind what we are doing. You will pass this course if you come to class and complete the ALEKS homework. There are four tests and a cumulative final, but they are exactly like the ALEKS homework. She offers extra credit opportunities.
Been teaching for forever and it shows. She explains very thoroughly.

If you are not good at math take her. She teaches slowly and helps students a lot! Tests are in class but are exactly like the aleks homework! She will help you through zoom if you need it, she wants her students to pass the class. Seriously the easiest class I have taken. If you do the aleks homework you will def pass.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Great professor, you can tell she enjoys her job and wants her students to succeed. With any class, you get as much as you put in. Ask questions if you don't understand she wants to help and keep up with the aleks so you're not trying to do everything finals week lol.

This has been the easiest class for me! Prof. Hardy is such a good teacher, I recommend you take her for this class, I promise that if you pay attention and do the ALEKS homework you will pass!! She also will make sure you understand something before moving on and she always answers questions! 10/10!!

She is a very amazing teacher, she teaches you in multiple ways to understand the topic. She also gives shortcuts on the calculator to help. Tests are in person, but if you do your homework and go to class youll get an A. A lot of extra credit and she literally zoomed at 12:30am one night to help me on homework.

While Hardy is an amazing professor, she also can be grating for a student. She talks to her students like they're children in a Sunday School class. She also prefers to use the most complicated solution to her problems when they could be solved in 2 steps instead of 8.

She is an OK teacher but she is very patronizing and will speak to you as if you are a child. She also made the class extremely difficult. Required courses should not be as hard as this one. She also constantly cancelled class and would not post any sort of notes for us to follow for the missed information.

All I can say is this woman is the best professor ever! She makes learning fun, and her material is easy if you pay attention. Even if you don't understand.. Aleks helps a lot in the explanation area, which helps me personally. Take her if you can !!!!!

I am currently taking this class and it is great. She has her own set of notes that you can get and she will teach through those. There is always homework on Aleks, but it is very helpful and an easy 100 as you get to keep doing it until you get it right. The test is the same questions from the homework.

Professor Hardy was my favorite professor of my entire semester. I like statistics as is, but she makes learning math so easy. Sometimes she teaches like we're children, but for me that helps a lot. She comes up with things to help us remember, homework and tests are through ALEKS and all of the tests are the homework questions. Def recommend.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Lots of homework--Graded by few things

comment: Good, but somewhat annoying. She is a great professor, although she tends to take the long and complicated route when it comes to formulas. She will take a 2-step addition/multiplication solution and make it a 5-step solution full of Xs, Ys, and parentheses. She also speaks to you like you are a child in a Sunday School class, minus the religion.

She is the best math teacher I have ever had! I took her class as a maymester course, and it was so easy! She basically gives you the answers for the exams. She allowed us to use our notes on our exams, and she had handouts we filled in as we went in class. 10/10 recommend you take her class.

I took her Maymester and it was very daunting to take a two week course and have class every day but it was absolutely worth it. You must dedicate your time to this class. I understood her lectures very well and she was very accommodating with homework. I have never been good at math but I am so glad I did this.

This is a two week, five hour (sometimes longer because she offers help sessions for two hours after class) every day MTWRF class.
I was so scared going into the class, but honestly Professor Hardy is amazing. She works so hard to make sure you get off the Island of STAT 1401. IF you are bad at math, take her. She won't fail you.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Gives good feedback

comment: Dr. Hardy is the most wonderful professor to ever exist. She TRULY cares about her students and genuinely wants to see them succeed. You will work for a good grade, but you will be supported. If you need help with anything, shes there for you.

Hardy is helpful and wants you to succeed. She does not take attendance but you shouldn't skip, and she has class over zoom if you don't want to show up in person. Caring and accessible outside of class. She knows what she is teaching. The only thing I didn't like was her grading system. It should be a straightforward system but it is not.
She was very helpful throughout the whole semester. Very understanding and always willing to help everyone, wants people to understand and do good.

This class was a breeze. Professor Hardy teaches well, provides tutoring sessions, responds to emails promptly, and we had an option to either come to class or join through zoom. She posts the zoom recordings as well if you need to miss a day, just email her to update it because she forgets. The homework is also the same as the tests. TAKE HER!

I took the "maymester" course for STAT and let me tell you DO NOT WASTE A WHOLE SEMESTER ON THIS CLASS! The maymester was only 2 weeks long and she teaches the class very well and is always available if you need help. The tests and open note and very straightforward, if you do well on the homework you will do amazing on the tests. Great class!!
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.--Lecture heavy

comment: Dr. Hardy is amazing, she really cares about her students success. Although class attendance is not required, I do suggest going to class, because she has thorough lectures. She is readily available outside of class if you have questions or concerns, even on weekends. She is very helpful if you are looking for a job or internship to gain experience
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Participation matters

comment: Prof Hardy was put on this earth to help students who struggle in math succeed. If that describes you, take her and if you put in the effort, you will be just fine. She is super caring and knows how to cater concept explanations to students based on their learning style. She is an absolute gem. 10/10 would recommend.

Took her for maymester. You wont go wrong taking this professor for STAT. She is super sweet, caring and wants all her students to succeed. Class isnt too hard, just focus on what you need to know for connectmath or you may feel overwhelmed. She was recommended to me several times, and I was not disappointed. TAKE HER !!!
Professor hardy is the sweetest professor ever. she cares about her students and wants you to be successful.

Out of all my online professors, Professor Hardy was my favorite. She constantly kept us on our toes with pop quizzes and extra credit for in-class and extracurricular participation. She also used methods that genuinely worked, such as using The Three Musketeers to help us remember sampling groups. Plus, I got to do drag for that same session!

She does zoom but I only attended 3 times bc I taught myself everything through Connect and I'm awful at math. The homework is the same as the test, just with diff numbers. So write down your homework problems and answers and helpful notes bc you'll make an A on every test. Only annoying thing is she never replied to emails.

Professor Hardy is one of my favorite teachers! She does a great job of explaining the material and the tests are very easy if you study a little (they are all on connect math). Take her if you want an easy A!

Professor Hardy is probably the best professor for this class! She really makes sure everyone understands the topic before moving on and makes sure everyone passes the tests. However, in order to pass with a good grade you should try to make every class. This class actually helped me to like statistics, take her if you can!!
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Being a student that usually struggles in Math classes, Dr. Hardy's class was a breath of fresh air. Her class was the easiest Math class I have ever had by far, and she made truly wants the best for her students. If you take her for STAT 1401, I recommend finding a study partner or group, as she sometimes struggles to fully explain things.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: do all your homework its not a lot and she has study sessions that really help, go to every class and do the participation assignments to guarantee an A, do the practice tests and youll do good on every test

Professor Hardy is how every professor should be. Gives clear grading criteria, tests are EXACTLY like in class problems, explains material very well, easily accessible after class, and just has a positive, happy attitude that is contagious. Truly a great professor and would highly recommend to anyone!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Hardy is the best professor I have ever had!!! She wants you to do well and helps you actually understand stat. I took the maymester and it was so much easier than I thought it would be. TAKE HER CLASS!!!!

Prof. Hardy gave me so much confidence in myself when it came to STAT. I have never been the best at math but her in-depth notes are very easy to understand and she makes the material manageable. Even in the wake of COVID she was always accessible and open to adjustable tutoring/office hours. Attend her class reg. and everything else will be easy.

t a k e h e r c l a s s . this is the first time i've written a "rate my professor" but she deserves it. professor hardy really got to know each student's learning styles, strengths, and weaknesses. she is the reason i will be pursing a statistcis minor and i can't wait to take more classes with her xoxo eeyorelover

Mrs. Hardy goes above and beyond the definition of an amazing professor. She is caring and sees your struggles before you do! She is encouraging, thoughtful in her presentation of material, and provides so many resources to succeed that even if you hate math, she might make you like it.. even love it. I can not recommend her high enough!!
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Awesome professor. She really cares about her students and will do whatever it takes to ensure you do well in her class. Explains material well, tests are exactly like the homework, and treats her students with respect. Can't say enough good things about her. Absolutely would take again and 10/10 would recommend.
rating_tags: Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: Prof Hardy is the best. She clearly cares about her students and is passionate about what she does. This class is definitely hard but she is there to help with anything and everything she can. She is one of the few teachers that wants you to learn above all else. If you have the chance to take her DO IT!! You won't regret it.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Prof Hardy knows the field and prepares her students for it. The HW can be tough & she's specific about what she wants, but she meets with her students regularly outside class to help them understand material and meet her expectations. She genuinely cares and loves her job. Prof Hardy is one of my favs and I highly recommend.

Professor Hardy clearly cares about the success of all students. It is obvious that she works VERY hard to help everyone out and is extremely resourceful. It seems like she is available after class 24/7, so if you need help all you need to do is ask. Very sweet, caring lady. Be ready to work hard. 10/10 recommend. You will definitely learn!
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader

comment: She is incredibly nitpicky and does not clearly state what she wants. She is kind of rude to students and about students. Has public ridiculed students in class multiple times. Explains statistics in possibly the worst way possible. I literally tutor people in statistics and have never gotten less than an A in a stats course and yet I am struggling

I suck at math but I have managed to get an A on every single one of the tests. She really cares about the students and wants to make sure that we all pass. She gives the best study material I have ever received for every single test. She also gives extra credit for being organized and taking a survey. 12/10 recommend!!

Fantastic professor! Easy A if you try. Makes class interesting and exciting. Has a very unique style of teaching and a daily positive/happy attitude. Posts study guides online that are literally identical to the tests. Takes the time to actually explain the material and truly does care about the well being of her students. Would HIGHLY recommend!
She basically lays out the entire class for you and it's extremely easy to learn with her.

I dislike Math with a passion. Professor Hardy is a gem. I took the MAYMESTER 2019 for 2wks/5hrs a day, it was tough, but her energy and what she brings forth each day is what got me through the course. She is not like your average professor, she seriously cares just listen to her! Follow her instructions! There is no reason to Cheat in her course.

She's one of the best Math professors I've had in a while. She's very clear in her syllabus and grading. She will go out of her way to help you. The tests aren't too bad. You just need to make sure you know the material. Her teaching style is great too. There's normally about 1 assignment online each week. Sometimes none.

AWESOME. Has her own textbook, $20 at most and it is the best. I made a 100 on every test and I am terrible at math. I made a B in college algebra. She is smart and is so helpful and is super clear about what is on a test. She even has tons of practice tests and problems. TAKE HER. you can also use a premade booklet on the tests that help a lot.

Professor Hardy is great! At the beginning of the semester you have to buy all of her notes but its not too expensive and it has everything you need. She lets you use a toolbox with all the formulas and everything on her tests and makes sure to explain everything thoroughly to ensure that everyone understands. Her teaching style is really helpful
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures--Caring

comment: Professor Hardy was amazing. She would always have help sessions everyday and she wouldn't move on from a topic until everyone understood it. She let us exempt the final if we had an A in the class (which is really easy to have) and if we got an A on our last test. Do the HW, go to class and you'll be able to get an A. Highly suggest you take her
She is the best professor I have ever had. I seriously recommend her because she makes math easy and fun. I did so good on the tests that she said I didn't even have to take a final!

Dr. Hardy is really great. She gives you everything (and more) that you could possibly need to do well in her class. Basically, she teaches like an elementary school teacher--material is broken down and very easy to understand. I wouldn't say she gives everyone an A but you can only do so much as lead the horse to water--you can't make them drink.

BEST PROFESSOR EVER!! I promise you won't find another professor that is as caring, loving, amazing, smart, funny, and genuinley interesting to learn from. She explains math in such a great way and is always there for questions. BEST PROFESSOR EVER.

Prof Hardy is amazing and I really appreciated her structured teaching style. She taught how to process and apply the info & steps in a way that was easy to understand, and remember. She engages the class, is clear about expectations, and explains things in such a way that even the the more complicated & complex concepts are easily attainable.

I don't even rate my professors but TAKE HER!!! If you're like me and math just doesn't seem to click with you, she makes it easy to understand. Tests are exactly like the study guides. Paying attention IN CLASS is 95% of the battle. The other 5% is connect math, which she gives you the entire semester to do.

Prof Hardy is seriously the best professor I have ever had at KSU. Before taking her class I had never made above a B or C in math, but I have an A in her class currently, and will likely end the course with an A as well. She truly cares about her students and wants to see every one of them succeed. If math isn't your strong suit TAKE PROF HARDY!!!

I am a person who always struggles with math, but Professor Hardy always knows how to explain the course content in a way that makes sense. If you struggle at all in the course she is more than happy to help you one on one. She is genuinely the best math teacher I have ever had, I wish I could take her for every math class!

Prof Hardy is quirky and hilarious but mostly she wants to see her students succeed. It's not the easiest class (stat never is) but her grading criteria is built in such a way that gives the student every opportunity to do well. Most of all she makes sure that you understand the material and hosts help sessions if you need just a little more help.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Hilarious

comment: The expectations are very clear: Show up, take notes, do your homework, and pass. The reviews for the tests are the best. Professor Hardy makes me look forward to class each time and I never have enjoyed math, until now. You have to purchase her notes from the bookstore, and they are the best!! You won't make a mistake taking her class.

Professor Hardy was hands down the best professor I have ever had. She takes the time to explain the problems and write down the steps which is extremely helpful for later on when you are practicing or studying for a test. It is very clear of what is expected and she reviews for every test, making sure that you are prepared and know what to expect.

As with most math classes, you better show up or you won't know what you're doing. She makes the class seem more important than it is, and does expect a lot from you, but she is a solid teacher and is available to help you after class. Make sure to ace connectmath (easy), show up, and study and you'll do fine.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: took this as a maymester , hardest class I ever took. she wants you to pass but she's a hard teacher. even with studying until 2am overnight, I barely passed the class.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY

comment: As much as I HATE math, this woman made it bearable. She may seem strict at first, but she has a meaning behind her methods. She is really a great teacher and would recommend to those struggling with Math like me. Just don't slack and fall behind because it will bite you at the end of the semester.

If you're "bad at math," Hardy is exactly the professor you need. You'll work your butt off for her, but she's really patient and sweet and will never make you feel like your questions are dumb. You might roll your eyes at the sheer amount of notes she gives you at the beginning, but they're REALLY helpful. She's the actual best.

Professor Hardy is a difficult teacher because she makes students work for their grade. This is not a class where you will be given the material and be expected to regurgitate it. She teaches students to think so they will be able to succeed in the work force. If you want an easy A and do not want to think for yourself, then do not take this class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: If you're a STAT minor, take her! If not, Don't take her! She makes you know STAT in and out but for someone who is taking the class for credit its headache. She expects so much between showing work and interpreting EVERYTHING you write. She is very specific, her way or no way. Get ready to write a lot.

Hardy is a great professor! I took her class as an elective for BIO majors and it was actually a relief. She's definitely changed my opinion on computer stats, in a good way! She's very easy to talk to, and always willing to work with you! Great Professor!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: This class will get you familiar with multiple systems of statistics like Excel, R, SAS, and Python. It is project based so make sure you understand what is happening in class. Professor Hardy prepares you for real world jobs so yes she is a tough grader but as long as you do the work and ask for help, it can be pretty easy. She is always available

Prof. Hardy always say "I want to teach you how to fish." Meaning, she wants to teach us how to figure things out on our own, and for some people that's not fun. I was not a computer nerd coming in, but this course has given me a new respect for being a Stat nerd. She genuinely cares about her "kids" and she is always willing to help you. Take her!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Professor Hardy is incredibly sweet and caring! Everything you need to learn for the three projects are posted right on d2l with tutorials on how do complete them. The course is tough, but She offers help session practically three times a week before class. It's a lot of information to learn, but I really feel prepared for a data analysis job
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: She did a great job of meeting the needs of her students and was available outside of class to work on the things students didnt fully understand. She made the class super interactive and took the time to get to know our names. She gave many opportunities for extra credit and bonus. She also likes to crack some jokes here and there to make it fun.

I like Professor Hardy I guess, BUT she is so confusing. Her instructions for projects are not clear. She changes her mind a lot, and she posts a new announcement on D2L every 10 minutes. Maybe some people understand her better, but I find her instructions and lectures unnecessarily complicated.

she is amazing bc of her my minor is going to be statistics, I am normally bad with math but her teaching skills made it very clear to me. I am taking her again next semester. She is absolutely hilarious and a fun professor.
The best professor I have had at Kennesaw. To put it simply, take her.

She is passionate but it is a little much. She herself even said in class " I teach way more than the other professors" If you want to learn way more than you need to for a gen ed class and take a class where the teacher requires way more than any other math teacher i have ever had than i urge you to take professor hardy. If not, take someone else.

I would HIGHLY recommend Prof. Hardy. Honestly ONLY take her even if you have to wait. She is nice and understanding. You dont have to go to class because she scans the notes everyday. She frequently posts updates & tries to make class fun. TAKE HER especially if you hate math. She puts old quizzes on D2L to study & they are exactly like the tests.

I would HIGHLY recommend taking professor Hardy. Honestly if you have to wait another semester to take her class then you should. She is incredibly nice and understanding. You dont have to go to class because she scans the notes everyday. She frequently posts updates and really tries to make the class fun. TAKE HER, especially if you suck at math.
rating_tags: Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: She's a great teacher, and is there to help you pass the class. Class really isn't mandatory because of the guided notes, but it does help to hear her explain it.
rating_tags: Participation matters--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Hardy is AMAZING!!! I would definitely take her again. She is very caring and provides blank note pages that goes with her lectures. If you don't get the grade you wanted in her class, it's because you did not apply yourself. Her class is set up so that every style of learner can understand stats and pass. She will make time for you.

Professor Hardy was my FAVORITE professor at Kennesaw. Because of her i started enjoying math. There is not reason not to make an A. She cares about your grade. Show her respect and she will make ANY effort for you to receive an A!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Caring

comment: Professor Hardy is an excellent professor. If you are not good at math, I HIGHLY recommend taking her. She makes the course material understandable, and constantly offers help to those that need it. She does not bump grades in the end, you have control of your homework, participation and extra credit grades. She's hilarious and will keep you awake!

This is hands down one of the best math professors I have taken!! All you need for this class is the online code and her guided notes which are the greatest thing ever and its only $25 bucks in the library. If you fail this class that means that you didn't do any work and didn't even try!! she gives you enough extra credit to help you pass!

Her teaching style was wonderful for those who struggle with learning math and she is always willing to help you during her office hours. She requires guided notes made specifically for her class and they really help with the learning process. She is very clear. A lot of questions on the test are from the optional homework problems in the notes.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Hardy has been a great teacher. She is funny and puts in a lot of effort to help you understand the material! She does not force you to do homework but you should do it if you want an A and it is also good practice! You can't go wrong by taking her class.

I am a math person so the class itself was not too difficult, however Professor Hardy definitely made it enjoyable and easier. You buy the notes and simply fill in the blanks which made learning simple. DO THE HOMEWORK--it counts for a whole letter grade & you can take until you get an 100. She's a wonderful, memorable professor and woman. 10/10

Professor Hardy is an AMAZING professor hands down. She really cares about her students and does all she can to make sure you at least pass her class. She holds study sessions as well. I never missed a day, and managed to make an A. Study hard, you'll do well.  The final replaces your lowest test score.  TAKE HER!!! you won't regret it.

Professor Hardy is hilarious, engaging, and very helpful! There are 3 tests, an online homework grade, and a final. She offers extra credit which makes it easier to pass the course. She offers help sessions and makes many resources available to struggling students. If you aren't good at math, take her! If you are, then it's a very easy A.

Don't let her name fool you because she's GREAT. She's a great prof that truly cares about her students. 4 test and a final (with some homework here and there). Final replaces lowest test. She basically gives you a cheat sheet (toolbox) every test. If anything the course itself is a tad difficult, and she only makes it easier.

I loved having Mrs. Hardy! She makes sure that all of her students understand the new materials before moving on, and she makes you feel like there's no such thing as a stupid question. She'll answer the same question 10 times if you need her to, and she's not afraid to take a different angle if she thinks you're not getting it. Tough grader though

HW and info overload! I felt lost at first, BUT youll NEVER find a more involved, dedicated, and helpful prof.  She will NOT give up until all your ?'s are answered. The final project, though more involved than the HWs, seemed like the easiest thing all semester. I GOT IT! Give yourself the chance to succeed and Prof. Hardy will make sure you do!

Prof. Hardy is by far one of the best teachers/professors I have ever had. She is super nice, so I never felt intimidated to ask her questions. She really goes out of her way to help. You can tell she wants everyone to understand the material and do well in the class, even if you are afraid of math. I definitely reccommend taking her class.

I'm a Junior and all I needed was one last math core credit. Almost every single math class that I've ever had up until Professor Hardys class was a struggle for me. Professor Hardy is an amazing teacher, she goes out of her way to constantly help students. Attend class, pay attention, seek help from her when needed and you will pass every test.

yes, she posts notes and gives answers to the tests, but you won't know what you're doing half the semester. changes her mind on class requirements and definitions EVERYDAY. 8 homeworks (5 hours average time), 2 tests, 6 quizzes, and a final project. the most mentally disorganized teacher i've ever taken. harsh, confusing, frustrating grader.

Okay, listen to me when I say this.. Professor Hardy is perfect! She offers all of her notes to you on the first day of class and makes a toolbox with all the formulas for you to use on the test. She gives partial credit on all of her tests, and she's so organized! The notes tell you what you need, and it allows you to stop writing & pay attention!

Even though you get a notecard, her tests are really tough.k  The problems are complicated versions of the homework.  I found it very challenging and frustrating.  I would take someone else.  I have a C.
Professor Hardy is the most caring professor I have ever taken in my life. Really wants you to excel in the classroom and in your career. Its a tough course, but she makes it enjoyable.

Very specific and persnickety, it scared me at first. Not for those who are into chill teachers. Very cautious. If you're bad at math, take her.  Goes the extra mile for her students because of the help sessions. You will make a good grade if you seize all the extra credit and help. Don't buy the textbook.

Professor Hardy was by far the best math teacher that I've ever had. She is there for her students whenever she is needed. I went to her office hours almost everyday after class and she helped me so much. I would definitely take her again. She gives study guides for every test and the tests are designed just like the study guide.
She is good.

Went into this class excited, but I didn't see in her what everyone else saw. The way she taught made me anxious. It was her first time teaching Stat Methods 1, and the disorganization was obvious. I would, however, recommend her in a couple semesters when she works out the kinks. She obviously cares about her students, just not a good fit for me.

She made stats fun! Somehow, she did it. Love this teacher. Truly, truly wants everyone to succeed and will make your day better. Be warned, many emails will be received. She will certainly keep you updated on everything. And she gives helps sessions. Loved her!

She is a good teacher if you don't mind the "mothering" , the changing of the syllabus, running your printer out of ink or paper  to print new and improved notes, and over 100 messages on D2L. She does online homework, some class participation is necessary, and she seems almost paranoid sometimes, but she isn't hard. Just do what is assigned.

I had her real and I never would've thought that math could be so painless at that time of day! She definitely was the reason i would get up to go. She is not monotoned by any means and can kind of be sarcastic (I liked that though). She does take attn. She will answer your questions and has help sessions all the time! Take her you won't be sorry!

There really is nothing bad to say about this professor. Just take her! The only thing that was a pain in this class is that she put the notes that you needed for the next day up pretty late. It was kind of hard for me since I did not have a printer so some days I would be without notes. But she puts them on the projector so it wasn't that bad.

Hardy is such a great professor. She cares a lot about her students and wants them to do well. Attendance is not mandatory, but YOU NEED TO COME TO CLASS. Each day you are learning something new but she explains it in such a way where you automatically understand. She is very clear on what exactly is going on the tests. TAKE HER.

Hardy put so much work into creating everything for this semester. So much respect for her quest to make things as simple as possible for us. I truly appreciate all the study sessions and hand crafted notes she spent hours on. Her sass can sometimes be mistaken for rudeness. Truly a life saver for the math impaired.
Really really good teacher. Made it easy to understand the material. If you take her you wont regret it!! Passionate and funny too!

BEST PROFESSOR EVER! She goes above and beyond for her students! Has many help sessions and at all times of day. She sets you up for success (A)! You do have to be organized and attend every class. She also offers extra credit opportunities before the course starts (do it!) and at the end.

Mrs. Hardy was the best math professor! She was SO helpful and always made it a point to answer as many questions as possible. Tests are easy, because she gives practice tests and the real one is almost exactly the same, just changes the numbers. Easy to make an A if you do the practice tests. Homework is mandatory online, but it's not bad.

Great professor that is willing to do anything to see her students succeed. 7am help sessions, etc. I made an A in the class by studying and looking at her previous tests which she provides. She wants to see students learn not just learn the motions, so have patience with her and you will get what you give. I recommend taking Mrs. Hardy.

This teacher is a nice lady, but can be picky on the interpretations and have to be specific on wording. She gives out past tests as study guides and does review sessions. Gives lots of extra credit opportunities. Advice: Pay attention to the wording used during analysis on the interpretations. Wording can bring you down a letter grade on tests.

Mrs. Hardy is a great professor who cares about her students and about the material.  She is very upbeat and makes the class enjoyable.  I am a returning student who has not had a math class in nearly 12 years but she was very helpful, approachable, and friendly.  If you study, you will get an A in her class.
I hate math and I struggled with this course. However, she was very helpful. Tons of help sessions. She made her own notes that you buy. Communicates well. I would recommend her.

She is amazing. I hate math, I'm absolutely terrible at it! She provides plenty of help sessions and keeps many ways of communication open for her students. She provides students with plenty of resources to be successful. Fun. Obviously loves what she does. Not an easy class in general. I would recommend her to anybody. I suck + earned a B+

She is one of the BEST professors I have ever had. She is an awesome, helpful and kind hearted professor. She freely gives her time to  students that need help, pay special attention to those weak students. I wish there are many professors like her. TAKE HER if you are doing a math class. She is AWESOME.

She is an amazing teacher. I'm not one for math but this was the most successful class I have ever attended. The material is boring but she makes it interesting. She is extremely helpful. Go to every help session you can and you will make an A in the class easy. She'll go to the end of the world to help you succeed so if you don't, you didn't try:)

Other Calculus professionals should really pay attention to Professor Hardy style of teaching. She teaches the concept for calculus at any level for the student.  This is what she was born to do. You will have to work hard to get an 'A'.  She will help you if you’re willing to put the work into learning the concepts. She's an Amazing teacher!

AMAZING instructor. She is so organized! She won't hand you an A, but she will give you every tool imaginable to be successful. You will have to work to make your grade, but Ms. Hardy is an amazing teacher! I highly recommend any class she teaches!
she is great. If you don't take her, you could be crazy. She makes calculus easy with several extra credit options.

Calc is hard be she goes over & beyond to help you learn. Give lots of xtra credit and hints for exams. She is very quick to responding to emails and accepts calls to her cell phone. Best prof ever!!!

Professor Hardy has been one of my favorite professors in college. I have always been good at math, but never enjoyed it before this class. She truly wants everyone to succeed, and better yet, learn the material! Drops the lowest of first 3 tests if your final is better. You feel like you really earned your grade after this class!

Amazing professor! Material is hard but she puts SO much time and effort into helping you succeed. 4exams, math labs and 1homework assignment she also offers tons of extra credit. You actually have to know the material to pass the exams you have to interpret everything.

AMAZING!!! Professor Hardy goes above and beyond for her students. You buy the notes which makes paying attention in class MUCH easier. Her help sessions are extremely beneficial and she will not proceed until everyone understands material. TAKE HER!

Unbelievable instructor!  I have never had a professor in college who cared about me being successful as much as Ms. Hardy!  She gave us every opportunity to learn.  She came in at 7 am for help sessions and then gave you extra credit for coming!  Amazing teacher whether you are good in Math or not!  Take her!

I would highly recommend Hardy! She is a really great professor and tries to give several ways to work the same problem.  She doesn't use the text, but buy the notes! She is willing to work with you after class and gives lots of opportunity to gain extra points.  Loved her!
She is the standard for all teachers !

Prof. Hardy is absolutely amazing.  You have to work for an "A" if you want it.  She makes herself available for students and is extremely helpful.  This class requires a lot of work, but it is worth it.  The only "personal issue" she has, is she truly wants her students to succeed.  You can lead a horse to water, but you can't make them drink!

Prof. Hardy is a very nice person & really cares about her students success. She will have peer tutors as well as help sessions for her students. She does assign a lot of homework and even assigned problems before the previous semester ended. If you are good in math I would highly recommend her.

Prof Hardy is good for people who are not good at math and need their hand held the entire time.  However, if you don't need to be babied, don't take her.  She assigns an insane amount of homework Don't take her you dont like busy work.  She thinks her class is the only class people take.  She has some obviously personal issues.

Prof Hardy is one of the best teachers I've had at Kennesaw. She really cares about her students and their grades. She likes you to come to class but it does not count against you if you don't. She gives you her cell # to call her whenever you need her! She gives lots of extra credit and holds a lot of help sessions. I recommend her big time!!!!

Prof. Hardy is the most amazing teacher. She teaches because she loves to and it shows. She truly cares about her students and wants them to succeed. If you try, you WILL get an A in this class. I am horrible at math and passed with an A+. She gives out her cell #. Use it, even on the take-home tests. Don't take MATH1106 until you can take her.

GREATEST MATH TEACHER EVER! Has her own set of notes she created, posts everything online including notes and test+answers from previous semesters. Makes sure you get the concept. No tricks on tests. Has numerous help sessions. I would def. take her again she is awesome and hilarious! TAKE HER IF YOU WANT AN A!!!!

Hands down the best teacher at KSU. She is not happy until you understand not just the mathematical process, but the why and for what. Lots of real life uses for what I used to consider a pointless subject. She goes to great lengths to make sure each student who cares to understand will understand. Great teacher!!! An A is possible for everyone.

LOVED this professor. She did anything and everything in her power to make sure that everyone passed. BUT BEWARE, she will NOT give you the extra point to make an A, etc. She offers 25 points for extra credit, and that is enough. So, DO ALL THE HOMEWORK. It all counts. But basically, if you do the work, you'll make a good grade. My fav math teacher

Hardy is an amazing teacher. Very hands on, makes prepared pkgs of notes for you to fill in, does hw for test grade at end of semester on MML and reviews for every test. She freaks you out a little to begin with by 4 msg in your inbox, but she is just really excited...Take her, shes awesome. Gives extra credit of 25 points to final points.

She is incredibly prepared and has everything you need to be succesful. She created her own version of a text book that is VERY helpful! she provides practice problems, answeres, practice quizzes, and she even posts past tests so that you will have an idea of how to prepare for tests. In addition, she has study sessions every day. HIGHLY reccomend

Mrs. Hardy is the best math prof I've ever had. She is thorough and really wants her students to "get it." Take her if you want to learn something! I don't consider myself a math person- but she took the time to make sure I got it.

Had her for trig and I understood everything. She goes step by step and is there whenever you need her. One of my favorite professors, great person and an amazing teacher. You have a chance to receive 25 bonus points! I would take her again!
Best Teacher ever Period. I hated math before her and she even made me consider being a Math Major. Classes are fun and with a little effort it's an easy A.
Shes a good teacher, very thorough. She has plenty help sessions and oppurtunities for extra credit. If you tell her you need help she'll find options for you

SHE IS WONDERFUL TEACHER EVER IN MY MATH CLASS. SHE IS PASSIONATE WITH HER STUDENTS. I HAD AN "A" IN THIS CLASS. IF YOU STUDY IN HER LECTURE NOTE, AND DO MATH LATH AND DOING FOLLOW HER, YOU WILL GET A EASILY.MOREOVER, THE TEST IS SIMILAR HER STUDY GUIDE IF YOU REVIEW HER STUDY GUIDE CAREFULLY. I ADVISE YOU SHOULD TAKE HER CLASS.

Ms. Hardy is the best math professor I have ever had. Her notes are very clear and easy to understand. She has a passion for math and makes it easy.She scans the notes after every class just in case you may miss something in the class session. She DOES NOT write with one hand and erase with the other! Attend class regularly do your hw and you will

Ms. Hardy is amazing and makes this class easy.  She has help sessions twice weekly and is always willing to help. The tests never have any surprises and are always straight forward. She is extremely devoted to math and truly wants you to succeed. She offers bonus points toward your final grade and makes the class easy. I actually enjoyed the class

Most of the students I talked to loved her and her teaching style. She is a great person and devoted to her students and subject matter. but, I would have prefered she use the book. Had trouble keeping up (she writes with one hand and erases with the other, though all lectures are scanned and posted.) had trouble organizing K's of pages.

Professor Hardy is a fantastic teacher.  She provides an amazing set of notes at the beginning of the semester that really make all the difference.  She makes sure that you really understand a concept and offers multiple help sessions outside of class.  Her exams are fairly easy if you know what you're doing. 3 exams, and a mandatory final.

Ms. Hardy is a WONDERFUL teacher! She takes the time to get to know you by name. She offers plenty of help. She is silly and sings to you. She sets up notes to be printed and bought for the semester which really really helps you get through the class. She does anything to try to help you understand what she is teaches. Amazing teacher!!!
Don't even think about cheating in her class.  It is not worth losing a letter of recommendation from her.  She really takes a lot of time on her letters, and makes them specific.

Great teacher, makes Calculus easy to understand. Very easy to get an A in her class, go to class, do the MyMathLab (20% of your grade). Offers help sessions after every class, extra credit, will take the time to help you in every way possible. You can score high C's low B's on tests and up with an A. If you can't pass her class, you're not trying.

Class is not mandatory. She will at the begining of the course tell you that its pretty easy to pass the class. If you do not do all of the mymathlab and extra credit then you will have a hard time passing. Make sure you buy the notes and check your email. I personally did not llike her teaching method and would not take her again.

Professor Hardy made Trignometry something that didn't kill me. In high school I made a not so good grade and in college a made an A. This professor really goes over and beyond limits to help her students succeed. No professor will go to the limits that she has. TAKE HER. :)

Ms Hardy is a blessing to the Kennesaw community, She makes passing this class so much easier than imaginable, Extra help sessions are available if you are willing to put the effort there, This prof has so much passion for her work that it radiates, Anyone who thinks otherwise is plain lazy, She made a dreaded class enjoyable for me and others!! :)

omg this is the best math proff. I've EVER had! she's awesome, she actually made trig fun!! and i hate math! but she made it cool. uses lots of diff. techniques, and really wants her students to pass. but it is lots of work, especiall the mymathlab hw. but if u work hard, UR BOUND TO GET AN A, i promise!
best math teacher i've ever had. she really cares about her students. take her and try and you will get an A
She is very helpful teacher. Very Easy if u love the math but even if u don't then also she tries the best for u to pass the class.

There is no denying that she is very friendly and knowledgeable in Statistics, but this woman drove me nuts! If you are good at math then this class will be a breeze for you, if you?re not so good, you?ll have to work extra hard. She talks a mile a minute expecting everyone to keep up and to know what she is talking about. I would get so frustrated

Very nice lady. Tons of resources given to pass the class. Will do her best to help you succeed. The only problem I have is that she takes FOREVER to grade you work. So if you are one of these people that have to know what you are making at all times then you will be frustrated by that.

She seriously gives you so many opportunities to get extra help and extra credit that if you make lower than a B in this class you had to try to fail.  She has her own lecture notes.  BUY THEM.  They are really helpful.  Read every single thing she emails/posts. She is an interesting lady.  Not sure how anyone could NOT like her.  She's adorable.

If you do not like math, and are hesitant about Stats..TAKE HARDY"S CLASS!! I got an A in this class and I always made Bs in high school. Dont expect an easy A though, you really have to actually do the optional homework, go to the help classes, and go to the class!! She makes learning so much fun!

She is awesome. She really wants each person to succeed. She was willing to hold study sessions at 7am each day for those who didn't understand the material. She really goes out of her way to make sure that everyone understands. She truly loves what she does and I highly recommend her!

Extremely helpful! Wants each student to succeed, and will offer all the help necessary if the student wishes to take her up on it. Offers lots of extra credit, including points for attending help sessions. Online support through email is available as well as a student instructor.
She is the best!!  provides many extra credit opportunities, and sometimes gives you the test online the night before.  I would take her over and over!

BEST TEACHER EVER! HIGHLY RECOMMEND! Math is my worst subject, but she offers extra credit and study sessions. Her tests are simple and cover the material in her practice tests. She wants her students to succeed, so she makes it fun...even at 8 AM.

I have now taken her for 1111 and 1112 and I will be taking her for 1107.  I think she is one of the best teachers I have ever had and highly recommend her.  She will bend over backwards just to make sure you know what you need to.
She's very helpful and explains everything thoroughly. If you have problems with math I recommend her

I ABSOLUTELY LOVE HER!! she is the best math teacher i have ever had and I am sad that I will not be able to take her for my next math.  I hate math and I am horrible at it, but with all of her hard work and effort I believe i will do pretty good in this class.  She puts in a lot of extra time and hard work, basically if you try, you will succeed.

I'm really surprised at some of the negative remarks. I'd like to see the nay-sayers put in the amount of work this woman does for her students.  I'm really amazed by her devotion. She will NOT fail you if you try, plain and simple. Ask her questions, participate, do the math xl, go to the help sessions and you will do fine. She's good!
The best math teacher I have ever had.

Buy the textbook and mathxl package from the bookstore asap while the price is low. Mathxl is necessary and provides extra help. You'll probably use almost a whole pack of printer paper for this class. Print on both sides to save your money and the trees. Don't bring the book to class. You only use it for your hw which she doesn't collect at all. S

Not a good teacher..goes extremely too fast for math learners.Clogs your email box with math notes. Test are composed of about 3 or 4 chapters just ridiculous. Too much to remember for one test!!!Don't take her.

She is fabulous and VERY devoted to the students.  Extremely generous with her free time by offering regular help sessions.  If you don't get a good grade in her class, it's your own fault.  Don't be a slacker and expect something for nothing.  By far, the BEST instructor and it's a real shame there aren't more instructors like her at KSU.

She was the best math teacher I have ever had.  She is so interested in how well her students do. I struggled at the start but then she contacted me and when I started going to the help sessions she holds, I started to do well. I love the book she has written so we don't have to write tons of notes. I made a B, I wished I had used her help earlier.

HEr class is pretty nce.  She uses the textbook only for homework that you don't have to turn in, but she has created her own little textbook that is much better.  Uses e-mail to communicate to students and sent 8 on the first day.  Go to study sessions and do homework and go to class to make a good grade. One really easy project.

Do NOT listen to any negative things written below. she is by far the best professor in the world. i have trouble withh math and i made an A. she is so helpful, so caring and so sweet. there are 3 tests, a final and a project thaht she will pratically do for you if you ask her for help. she gives extra credit on one of the tests. dont buy the book.

Good teacher.  Very clear.  Very helpful.  Easy to get in touch with.  Attendance not mandatory, but very helpful.  Made her own testing booklet which was awesome. She cares and wants everyone to do well.  Take it if you want a good Stat teacher.
Mood swings from day to day.  Nearly impossible to reproduce what she wants on the test.  Tries to be helpfull, but has problems relating the material.

At first she comes across as really nice and helpful and friendly but then when it comes time to actually do work then she is no help whatsoever. don't be surprised if she makes you stand up and do stretches in the middle of class. if you miss the third grade then this is the class to take. you never know what she wants on tests and she can't teach

Teacher holds after class tutoring sessions if there are any questions. very clear cut attendence not mandatory but helps to understand all lessons.  best math teacher i've ever had. if you get the chance take her she really cares about her students!

I suck at math, but this is the prof that got me through it. I made a 'C', but if I had attended more regularly and took advantage of the tutoring she offers I am confident even I would have done better. I think she is almost impossible to fail, if the student is willing to put in the effort.

Honestly the best teacher i have ever encountered. Not quite sure how to describe it.. think of her as a character out of all these teacher movies you see on TV; just in real life.  She cares, she tries and it shows. Her explanations are clear, the classes fun (yes FUN math), she is motivated and wants you to do well. I wish for more like her.

She's really nice.  She gives you all the notes and even lets you use them on the tests.  There is absolutely no reason to fail this class, even if you can't add 2 and 2.  She will call you if you miss alot of class or make a bad grade, just to make sure everyhting is okay in your life.  I's diffenatley reccommened her.

This class was ridiculous! It was easy at times, but hard at other times. Dont have to do any homework and I wouldnt recommend it. Skips around alot. WHATEVER YOU DO, DO NOT GIVE HER YOUR NUMBER!!!! She will call you if you make a bad grade on anything! And she's sexy!
